channel.title: Pages on Pietro Grandinetti Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Pietro Grandinetti Personal Website

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, Pete here. Lifelong learning and outdoor sport is what I do. I wasn’t a big fan of blogs until I realized that I needed one. I write here, though, primarily for me. To be sure, I am happy if I can help somebody else too, but the writing is for me. I need to see what’s that I actually know, and to put concepts in writing is the best way to really understand what things I did, what I didn’t, and what I missed because I didn’t even know about them.
